forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 14C. NNW winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 58F. NNW winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Windy early. Low 7C. NNW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. NNW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. NNW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. NNW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. N winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
